insert.foreach: INSERT INTO tbl_files ( FILE_SEQ, FILE_P_CODE, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_NAME ) VALUES( SEQ_FILES.NEXTVAL, #{file_p_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_origin_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_upload_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_files ( FILE_SEQ, FILE_P_CODE, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_NAME ) VALUES( SEQ_FILES.NEXTVAL, #{file_p_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_origin_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_upload_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
